title: On the injective dimension of unit Cartier and Frobenius modules
authors: Manuel Blickle, Daniel Fink, Alexandria Wheeler, Wenliang Zhang
abstract:
Let $R$ be a regular $F$-finite ring of prime characteristic $p$. We prove
that the injective dimension of every unit Frobenius module $M$ in the category
of unit Frobenius modules is at most
$\operatorname{dim}(\operatorname{Supp}_R(M))+1$. We further show that for unit
Cartier modules the same bound holds over any noetherian $F$-finite ring $A$ of
prime characteristic $p$. This shows that $\dim A+1$ is a uniform upper bound
for the injective dimension of any unit Cartier module over a noetherian
$F$-finite ring $A$.
